Text: THIS IS A REPLACEMENT. THE OTHER "Le Proces De Jeanne D'arc" TORRENT HAD PROBLEMS WITH THE SUBS. THE SUBS WHERE NO GOOD. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE.
Thanks, I will get the new english subs.  I notice the video file is a different size, should I download that again?
You better download it again. The subs is not synched to the other file.

hey everybody!

i have a problem with the sound for this movie : no sound at all with bsplayer pro... i have the same problem with robert bresson's 'pickpocket'. can someone help me? i dont have any problem with the sound with any other movie... so...

Try this http://www.k-litemegacodecpack.com/. Get the standard pac and play it in media player classic. 
it is dual audio so you can choose between French 
and Italian audio.
thank you very much for the help, kegir! :-)

Thanks kegir for re-doing the torrent.
I have the previous one and the English subs are in a sort of pidgeon English format that just can't be understood.
PS. Nice to see the torrent still going after 15 months. Nice one peeps.

Compared to other Bresson works, this one is deceptively simple. There is the characteristic attention to detail, and, it must be said, the characters are not 'buffoons' (Bresson's own description) like the Dreyer version (which is superb in its own right). These two are the best films on Joan I've seen so far.
The rip is excellent (the movie is small, though). Thank you very much, *kegir*!

Thanks for uploading this.
Excellent copy.
